/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC   -shared -Wl,-soname,libxma.so.1 -o libxma.so.0.1.0 CMakeFiles/xma.dir/xma_timer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/xma.dir/xma_service.cpp.o CMakeFiles/xma.dir/xma_listener.cpp.o CMakeFiles/xma.dir/xma_thread.cpp.o CMakeFiles/xma.dir/xma_application.cpp.o CMakeFiles/xma.dir/xma_shell.cpp.o CMakeFiles/xma.dir/xma_process.cpp.o CMakeFiles/xma.dir/xma_epoll.cpp.o CMakeFiles/xma.dir/xma_socket.cpp.o  -L/usr/local/lib -lreadline -lpthread -levent -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
